import React from 'react' import Ruler from '../components/Ruler' import i18n from '../i18n' import { useMainStyle } from '../contexts/Theme' export default ({ address, balance, burnWallet, goBack }) => { const mainStyle = useMainStyle() return (
{i18n.t('burn_wallet.burn_private_key_question')}
{i18n.t('burn_wallet.disclaimer')}
) }
